languages.text: "Мне прискорбно смотреть на то как истлела твоя вера, сын Империума. Скажи, отринуть Его свет и уподобиться ксеносам и еретикам во лжи и предательстве — стоило ли оно того?"

traits.locale_text: "Мне прискорбно смотреть на то как истлела твоя вера, сын Империума. Скажи, отринуть Его свет и уподобиться ксеносам и еретикам во лжи и предательстве — стоило ли оно того?"

languages.text: "It pains me to behold how your faith has withered, son of the Imperium. Tell me, when you renounced His light, turned to lies and treachery, and, in doing so, became like xenos and heretics, was it worth it?"
languages.original_text: "Мне прискорбно смотреть на то как истлела твоя вера, сын Империума. Скажи, отринуть Его свет и уподобиться ксеносам и еретикам во лжи и предательстве — стоило ли оно того?"

languages.text: 「帝国の息子よ、お前の信仰がいかに衰えたかを見るのは辛い。教えてくれ、お前は主の光を捨て、嘘と裏切りに走り、そうすることで異種族や異端者のようになったが、それに見合う価値があったのか？」
languages.original_text: "It pains me to behold how your faith has withered, son of the Imperium. Tell me, when you renounced His light, turned to lies and treachery, and, in doing so, became like xenos and heretics, was it worth it?"

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の息子よ、お前の信仰がいかに衰えたかを見るのは辛い。教えてくれ、お前は主の光を捨て、嘘と裏切りに走り、そうすることで異種族や異端者のようになったが、それに見合う価値があったのか？」

languages.text: “帝国的子嗣啊，看到你的信仰如此凋零，我感到痛心不已。你放弃了神皇的明光，踏上了谎言与背叛的道路，变得像那些异形和异端分子一样。告诉我，帝国的子嗣，这么做值得吗？”
languages.original_text: "It pains me to behold how your faith has withered, son of the Imperium. Tell me, when you renounced His light, turned to lies and treachery, and, in doing so, became like xenos and heretics, was it worth it?"

traits.locale_text: “帝国的子嗣啊，看到你的信仰如此凋零，我感到痛心不已。你放弃了神皇的明光，踏上了谎言与背叛的道路，变得像那些异形和异端分子一样。告诉我，帝国的子嗣，这么做值得吗？”

languages.text: «Me duele contemplar cómo se ha marchitado su fe, hijo del Imperium. Dígame, ¿valió la pena renunciar a Su luz, elegir la mentira y la traición y, al hacerlo, convertirse en un igual de los xenos y los herejes?».
languages.original_text: "It pains me to behold how your faith has withered, son of the Imperium. Tell me, when you renounced His light, turned to lies and treachery, and, in doing so, became like xenos and heretics, was it worth it?"

traits.locale_text: «Me duele contemplar cómo se ha marchitado su fe, hijo del Imperium. Dígame, ¿valió la pena renunciar a Su luz, elegir la mentira y la traición y, al hacerlo, convertirse en un igual de los xenos y los herejes?».

languages.text: "Es schmerzt mich, zu sehen, wie Euer Glaube verkümmert ist, Sohn des Imperiums. Sagt, als Ihr Euch von seinem Licht abgewendet habt, Euch Verrat und Lügen zugewendet habt und so wie die Xenos und Ketzer geworden seid ... war es das wert?"
languages.original_text: "It pains me to behold how your faith has withered, son of the Imperium. Tell me, when you renounced His light, turned to lies and treachery, and, in doing so, became like xenos and heretics, was it worth it?"

traits.locale_text: "Es schmerzt mich, zu sehen, wie Euer Glaube verkümmert ist, Sohn des Imperiums. Sagt, als Ihr Euch von seinem Licht abgewendet habt, Euch Verrat und Lügen zugewendet habt und so wie die Xenos und Ketzer geworden seid ... war es das wert?"

languages.text: « Je souffre de voir à quel point votre foi s'est étiolée, fils de l'Imperium. Dites-moi, quand avez-vous renoncé à Sa lumière ? Quand vous êtes-vous tourné vers le mensonge et la traîtrise, rejoignant par là même les rangs des xénos et des hérétiques ? Cela en valait-il la peine ? »
languages.original_text: "It pains me to behold how your faith has withered, son of the Imperium. Tell me, when you renounced His light, turned to lies and treachery, and, in doing so, became like xenos and heretics, was it worth it?"

traits.locale_text: « Je souffre de voir à quel point votre foi s'est étiolée, fils de l'Imperium. Dites-moi, quand avez-vous renoncé à Sa lumière ? Quand vous êtes-vous tourné vers le mensonge et la traîtrise, rejoignant par là même les rangs des xénos et des hérétiques ? Cela en valait-il la peine ? »

languages.text: "İnancının böyle solup gittiğini görmek beni derinden yaraladı İmparatorluğun oğlu. Söyle bana. O'nun ışığını reddetmene, yalana ve hıyanete dönmene ve bunları yaparken zenolara ve kâfirlere dönüşmene değdi mi?"
languages.original_text: "It pains me to behold how your faith has withered, son of the Imperium. Tell me, when you renounced His light, turned to lies and treachery, and, in doing so, became like xenos and heretics, was it worth it?"

traits.locale_text: "İnancının böyle solup gittiğini görmek beni derinden yaraladı İmparatorluğun oğlu. Söyle bana. O'nun ışığını reddetmene, yalana ve hıyanete dönmene ve bunları yaparken zenolara ve kâfirlere dönüşmene değdi mi?"
